liteminer.configuration.title: Liteminer Configuration
liteminer.config.key_mode.tooltip: In Hold mode you must keep holding the key to mine. In toggle mode you have to hit the key to toggle.
liteminer.config.show_hud.tooltip: Enables the text showing how many blocks you have selected and your mining shape.
liteminer.config.hud_scale.tooltip: Changes how big the HUD elements are.
liteminer.config.block_break_limit.toolt: Upper limit to how many blocks can be broken at a time.
liteminer.config.require_correct_tool_en: If enabled, blocks can only be broken if holding the correct tool.
liteminer.config.harvest_time_per_block_: Increases the time it takes to break a block when vein mining.
Modifier used to scale up the time it needs to mine a block. Higher values mean longer times to mine.
liteminer.config.food_exhaustion_enabled: Causes your hunger to go down per block mined.
liteminer.config.food_exhaustion.tooltip: How much food exhaustion to cause per block broken.
liteminer.config.prevent_tool_breaking.t: Stops vein mining when the durability of the tool gets to 1.
